document_data.name: Hakima
document_data.mainbody: '''Hakimas''', or '''wise women''', were insightful [[cleric]]s in [[Zakhara]].<ref group="note">Hakima was a [[cleric]] class kit for the [[Al-Qadim]] setting.
document_data.Requirements: All hakimas were female and possessed great wisdom.
document_data.Role: Hakimas did not provide martial aid, though they were capable of defending themselves if needed. Instead they served as tribal family protectors or even leaders.
document_data.Possessions: These women owned a wide variety of clothing and other equipment depending on their wealth.
document_data.Benefits: Hakimas excelled at reading the truth in others, extending to being able to detect magical illusions and shapechanging. This ability developed as the hakima progressed and gained wisdom.
document_data.Hindrances:
Hakimas could not use magical items and scrolls as well as other clerics. They were only able to use universal magical items.

Hakimas could not turn [[undead]] like other priests.
